sourcesContent:
// OrderDetail.js import React from 'react'; const OrderDetail = ({ order, onClose }) => { // Assume there are some order details to display const orderDetails = { items: [ { id: 1, name: 'Item A', price: 20.0, quantity: 2 }, { id: 2, name: 'Item B', price: 30.5, quantity: 1 }, ], total: 70.5, shippingAddress: '123 Main St, City, Country', }; return (

Order Detail - #{order?.id}

Order #{order?.id}

{new Date(order?.transaction_date).toLocaleDateString()}

status

{order?.transaction_status}

Total discount

{order?.total_discount}

Total amount

{order?.total_amount}

Total payment

{order?.total_payment}

Payment Method

{order?.PaymentMethodId}

    {orderDetails.items.map(item => (
  • {item.name} ${item.price} x {item.quantity}
    • ))}

Total: ${orderDetails.total}

Shipping Address: {orderDetails.shippingAddress}

); }; export default OrderDetail;
